docTitle.titlePart: Über Oxidpnictide: Zur Kenntnis von Ba2Mn2Sb20 und Ba2Mn2BitO

front.note: On Oxidpnictides: Preparation and Crystal Structure of Ba2Mn2Sb20 and Ba2Mn2Bi20

byline.docAuthor: Erwin Brechtel, Gerhard Cordier und Herbert Schäfer*

byline.affiliation:
Abteilung II für Anorganische Chemie im Eduard-Zintl-Institut
der Technischen Hochschule Darmstadt,

front.div:
The new oxide pnictides Ba2Mn2Sb20 and Ba2Mn2Bi20 crystallize in the hexagonal
system (space group P63/mmc) with the following constants:
Ba2Mn2Sb20: a = 471
±1 pm, c = 2004
± 2 pm,
c/a = 4.255,
Ba2Mn2Bi20: a = 480.3 ± 0.5pm, c = 2009.7 ± 1.0pm, c/a = 4.184.
The M n and Sb(Bi) atoms form corrugated hexagonal nets. These nets are bridged be-
tween the M n atoms by O atoms to double layers separated by B a atoms.
